channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Between 2 houses, where parking cars, is whole , this job started many month ago , still not finished but nobody are working there for a while, 23rd September
item.description:
Can you fixed this with a council, to imidiatelly finish this ongoing job! Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wadding Street, Walworth, London

item.title: Main entrance Broken - Kinder House, 23rd September
item.description:
The main entrance door of Kinder House is broken. The door itself will not lock automatically and has remained unlocked. It has been like this since earlier this month.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cranston Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fouling and Litter, 23rd September
item.description:

item.title: Overgrown vegetation, 23rd September
item.description:
Overgrown vegetation on long communal strip between no.13 & 14 Stonegate Close. Side fence at no.14 Stonegate Close is gradualy being worn down during periods of heavy overgrowth. Cut back the vegetation & keep it off the fence at no.14 Stonegate Close.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Stonegate Close, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Overfilled bin, 23rd September
item.description:
Once again this bin is full with general trash and lots of dog poo bags. It used to be emptied regularly but now I spend my life reporting the problem to you.!! Can you either get it emptied regularly or remove the bin permanently as,in its present state, it is a serious health hazard. The bin is at head level on the lamppost and is very unpleasant to walk past when as full as it is now. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kelsey Lane, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, no MOT or road tax, 23rd September
item.description:
Blue Mini (car reg: MX60 RWN) abandoned in a residents parking bay for several months. Vehicle has no valid MOT or road tax. Vehicle needs removing please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous footpath on school route., 23rd September
item.description:
Tree outside 6 Wendover Way was felled earlier this summer but no further works have taken place. The stump has been left at a dangerous height and roots are lifting the footway, leaving uneven surfaces. Children have already tripped coming off scooters on their way to school. The roots are also pushing through tarmac and starting to damage my driveway. Please arrange urgent inspection and repair

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wendover Way, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet
